member.name: F:LibVlcWrapper.libvlc_video_marquee_option_t.libvlc_marquee_Text
member.summary: Marquee text to display. (Available format strings: Time related: %Y = year, %m = month, %d = day, %H = hour, %M = minute, %S = second, ... Meta data related: $a = artist, $b = album, $c = copyright, $d = description, $e = encoded by, $g = genre, $l = language, $n = track num, $p = now playing, $r = rating, $s = subtitles language, $t = title, $u = url, $A = date, $B = audio bitrate (in kb/s), $C = chapter, $D = duration, $F = full name with path, $I = title, $L = time left, $N = name, $O = audio language, $P = position (in %), $R = rate, $S = audio sample rate (in kHz), $T = time, $U = publisher, $V = volume, $_ = new line)

member.name: F:LibVlcWrapper.libvlc_video_marquee_option_t.libvlc_marquee_Color
member.summary: Color of the text that will be rendered on the video. This must be an hexadecimal (like HTML colors). The first two chars are for red, then green, then blue. #000000 = black, #FF0000 = red, #00FF00 = green, #FFFF00 = yellow (red + green), #FFFFFF = white

member.name: F:LibVlcWrapper.libvlc_video_marquee_option_t.libvlc_marquee_Opacity
member.summary: Opacity (inverse of transparency) of overlayed text. 0 = transparent, 255 = totally opaque.

member.name: F:LibVlcWrapper.libvlc_video_marquee_option_t.libvlc_marquee_Position
member.summary: You can enforce the marquee position on the video.

member.name: F:LibVlcWrapper.libvlc_video_marquee_option_t.libvlc_marquee_Refresh
member.summary: Number of milliseconds between string updates. This is mainly useful when using meta data or time format string sequences.

member.name: F:LibVlcWrapper.libvlc_video_marquee_option_t.libvlc_marquee_Size
member.summary: Font size, in pixels. Default is -1 (use default font size).

member.name: F:LibVlcWrapper.libvlc_video_marquee_option_t.libvlc_marquee_Timeout
member.summary: Number of milliseconds the marquee must remain displayed. Default value is 0 (remains forever).

member.name: F:LibVlcWrapper.libvlc_video_marquee_option_t.libvlc_marquee_X
member.summary: X offset, from the left screen edge.

member.name: F:LibVlcWrapper.libvlc_video_marquee_option_t.libvlc_marquee_Y
member.summary: Y offset, down from the top.

member.name: F:LibVlcWrapper.libvlc_video_logo_option_t.libvlc_logo_file
member.summary: Full path of the image files to use.

member.name: F:LibVlcWrapper.libvlc_video_logo_option_t.libvlc_logo_x
member.summary: X coordinate of the logo. You can move the logo by left-clicking it.

member.name: F:LibVlcWrapper.libvlc_video_logo_option_t.libvlc_logo_y
member.summary: Y coordinate of the logo. You can move the logo by left-clicking it.

member.name: F:LibVlcWrapper.libvlc_video_logo_option_t.libvlc_logo_delay
member.summary: Individual image display time of 0 - 60000 ms.

member.name: F:LibVlcWrapper.libvlc_video_logo_option_t.libvlc_logo_repeat
member.summary: Number of loops for the logo animation. -1 = continuous, 0 = disabled.

member.name: F:LibVlcWrapper.libvlc_video_logo_option_t.libvlc_logo_opacity
member.summary: Logo opacity value (from 0 for full transparency to 255 for full opacity).
